translation.en: ♪ Right this way, enjoy your stay ♪ ♪ Here at Mango Manor ♪
translation.fr: Par ici, venez séjourner Ici à Mango Manor

translation.en: ♪ With Deepa and Anoop ♪  ♪ With Deepa and Anoop! ♪
translation.fr: Avec Deepa et Anoop Avec Deepa et Anoop !

translation.en: ♪ We all say a perfect day's when we are all together ♪
translation.fr: Quelle belle journée Ensemble on va passer

translation.en: ♪ With Deepa and Anoop ♪  ♪ With Deepa and Anoop! ♪
translation.fr: Avec Deepa et Anoop Avec Deepa et Anoop !

translation.en: ♪ Come on in and join the fun ♪ ♪ Plenty of room for everyone ♪
translation.fr: Venez vous amuser Tout le monde est invité

translation.en: ♪ Need some help? Our family's here ♪ ♪ Ready, set, go, let's give a cheer! ♪
translation.fr: On est là pour vous aider Un, deux, trois, partez

translation.en: ♪ Namaste, we'll turn your day ♪ ♪ From good to great, come celebrate ♪
translation.fr: Un séjour chez nous On y est bien comme tout

translation.en: ♪ With Deepa and Anoop ♪  - ♪ I'm Deepa, he's Anoop! ♪ -
translation.fr: Avec Deepa et Anoop Je suis Deepa, voici Anoop

translation.en: Perfect For Par- nani!
Ready, Anoop?
It's Veena Ballerina time! Hit it, Naani- ji!
translation.fr: C'est l'heure de danser. Vas-y, Naani-ji.

translation.en: That last note sounded pretty funny, Naani- ji!
Not music. Only…
…hiccup.
Mail time!
We just got a letter, and guess who it's from?
translation.fr: Devine qui a envoyé une lettre.

translation.en: Your mother!
She's coming to Mango Manor! All the way from India!
translation.fr: Elle vient à Mango Manor depuis l'Inde.

translation.en: Ma is coming here?
Ooh! Bahut achha!
Oh, ho! Oh, happiness!
Naani- ji, I never thought of you as having a mother before!
translation.fr: Je n'avais jamais réalisé que tu avais une mère.

translation.en: Beta, everyone has a mother.
translation.fr: Tout le monde a une mère.

translation.en: And I can't believe I finally get to see my Ma!
translation.fr: Je vais enfin revoir ma maman.

translation.en: Oh, it's been so long!
And according to this letter, she'll be here…
oh, here it is… Today!
Today? Oh… but it's not like Ma to not tell us sooner. Did she not send an email?
translation.fr: Aujourd’hui ? Elle aurait prévenu avant. On n'a pas reçu d'e-mail ?

translation.en: No, no. I would have definitely read such an important--
translation.fr: Non, j'aurais lu un truc aussi important…

translation.en: Oh ho. Oh, is that what's been flashing for two weeks? Oopsy.
translation.fr: Oh, c'est donc ça qui clignote depuis deux semaines. Oups.

translation.en: Oh, no matter!
I have missed my Ma so much, and I can't wait to see her!
translation.fr: Elle m'a beaucoup manqué, j'ai hâte de la voir.

translation.en: Everything must be Ati Uttam!
Ati Uttam?
That means everything must be perfect for Par- nani!
translation.fr: Tout doit être parfait pour Par-Nani.

translation.en: She's a tough cookie. You'll see.
Oh, there is so much to do to get ready before she arrives!
translation.fr: Il y a tant à faire pour préparer son arrivée.

translation.en: Hai hai! She's here!
Ooh… Come, come!
We must look our best for Par- nani! Line up!
translation.fr: Soyez présentables pour Par-Nani. En rang.

translation.en: Are you okay, Naani- ji?
That's another big hiccup!
Look, everyone, it's… Ma!
Namaste!
Namaste, Betiyaa.
Deepa! Come meet your Par- nani!
Namaste, Par- nani!
Comb your hair!
Tuck in your shirt!
Stand up straight!
Wipe up that drool!
I am very tired after my very long trip. I would like a good nap…
translation.fr: Ce voyage m'a épuisée. J'aimerais faire une sieste.

translation.en: and then I'll have my usual--
translation.fr: Ensuite, je prendrai un morceau de love cake

translation.en: a piece of Love Cake, a mango lassi, and some veena music.
translation.fr: Ensuite, je prendrai un morceau de love cake et un lassi à la mangue sous un air de vînâ.

translation.en: Acha, Ma. It will all be--
-- waiting for you after your nap.
I will go nap now.
Right this way, Grandma- ji.
I've never seen Naani- ji look so nervous!
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais vu Naani-ji comme ça.

translation.en: So much to prepare! And for Par- nani, all must be…
translation.fr: Il y a tant à faire. Et tout doit être…

translation.en: Ati Uttam!
We know. Perfect.
And we're ready to help!
Love Cake is your Par- nani's favorite after- nap snack.
translation.fr: Le love cake est son goûter préféré.

translation.en: Come on, now, you two. Stir, stir, stir!
Your hiccups are getting out of control!
Oh, never mind that. Let's see that batter!
translation.fr: Peu importe. Voyons voir cette pâte.

translation.en: Now off to the oven!
Par- nani is gonna love this Love Cake!
translation.fr: Par-Nani va adorer ce love cake.

translation.en: An Ati Uttam Love Cake!
Ohh! Arre Baap Re! Oh no!
translation.fr: Oh, arre baap re. C'est pas vrai !

translation.en: You're right, Anoop. It does kinda look like Par- nani.
translation.fr: C'est vrai. Il ressemble un peu à Par-Nani.

translation.en: Par- nani's Love Cake is no good,
and I still have to make mango lassi and play veena!
translation.fr: et je dois encore faire un lassi et jouer de la vînâ.

translation.en: Naani- ji never acts this worried. She's sorta making me dizzy!
translation.fr: Elle n'est jamais aussi inquiète. Elle me donne le vertige.

translation.en: I need that, oh…
…but how can I do those things with these rotten hiccups?
translation.fr: Mais comment faire avec ce fichu hoquet ?

translation.en: Don't worry, I know just what to do.
translation.fr: Ne t'inquiète pas, j'ai une idée.

translation.en: Anoop and I will make the mango lassi and fix the cake
translation.fr: On va faire le lassi et arranger le gâteau.

translation.en: while you try to get rid of your hiccups!
Oh, this yoga breathing should take care of my…
…hiccups.
It's an ancient cure.
How's it going in there?
Got milk, yogurt, and sugar, and we're ready to lassi!
translation.fr: On a du lait, du yaourt et du sucre. Tout pour faire un lassi.

translation.en: Good! For mango lassi, you have to use four…
…or five mangoes!
Did she say 45 mangoes?
Got 'em!
Now for the perfect lassi,
your Par- nani insists you must blend it very well,
translation.fr: Par-Nani vous demande de bien tout mixer

translation.en: making sure to use all the juice and the pulp from the mango!
translation.fr: en veillant à utiliser tout le jus et la pulpe de la mangue.

translation.en: This is gonna be a lot of work, Anoop. We need to fill this whole bin with mango juice!
translation.fr: On a du pain sur la planche. Il faut remplir cette corbeille de jus.

translation.en: Get ready to start squishin'!
We've got the cake, and we've got the mango lassi.
translation.fr: On a le gâteau et le lassi à la mangue.

translation.en: All set for Par- nani's veena concert. How does it look?
translation.fr: Tout est prêt pour le concert de vînâ. C'est comment ?

translation.en: Oh, it's beautiful, Deepa!
Thank you all for your help. Hear that?
translation.fr: Merci pour votre aide. Vous entendez ?

translation.en: I don't hear anything.
Exactly! No hiccups.
Oh! My yoga cure is working!
Oh! Ma! You're awake! Ah, I am.
translation.fr: - Maman ! Tu es réveillée. - En effet.

translation.en: And now I would like to hear some veena music.
translation.fr: J'aimerais t'entendre jouer de la vînâ.

translation.en: You got it, Par- nani! Come sit over here, please.
translation.fr: D'accord, Par-Nani. Viens t'asseoir, s'il te plaît.

translation.en: Oh no! Naani- ji's hiccups are back!
translation.fr: Oh non ! Le hoquet de Naani-ji est de retour.

translation.en: Naani- ji's in trouble, Anoop! What she needs is a distraction.
translation.fr: Naani-ji est en difficulté, Anoop. On doit faire diversion.

translation.en: It's Veena Ballerina time!
Ooh! What's this all about? Fantastic!
Rad moves!
And now it's mango lassi time!
translation.fr: Maintenant, le lassi à la mangue.

translation.en: 45 mangoes all squished to perfection!
Hoo! And it wasn't easy!
Mango lassi… in a basket?
I don't see it.
Oh no, it leaked out!
I guess the bin's made for mangoes, not mango lassis.
translation.fr: Une corbeille, c'est pas fait pour les lassis.

translation.en: Aw. Well, I hope you at least have Love Cake.
There is a problem, Ma. The Love Cake…
translation.fr: Il y a un problème. Le love cake…

translation.en: …isn't just any Love Cake!
It's a super- special one, made just for you, Par- nani!
translation.fr: Il est super spécial, on l'a fait rien que pour toi.

translation.en: See? It looks just like you!
You think I look like that?
I do look yummy!
I wanted everything Ati Uttam, just perfect for you, Ma.
translation.fr: Je voulais que tout soit ati uttam. Parfait pour toi, maman.

translation.en: Oh, Betiyaa.
I know I have my ways.
translation.fr: Je sais que je suis difficile,

translation.en: But you don't need to work so hard to impress me!
translation.fr: mais ne te donne pas autant de mal pour moi.

translation.en: I'm just happy to see you and spend time with my family.
translation.fr: Je suis contente de te voir et de profiter de ma famille.

translation.en: But my hiccups ruined everything.
translation.fr: Mais mon hoquet a tout gâché !

translation.en: Remember what we say in India? If you have the hiccups,
translation.fr: Rappelle-toi ce qu'on dit en Inde : Si tu as le hoquet,

translation.en: it means you are missing someone very much.
translation.fr: ça veut dire que quelqu'un te manque beaucoup.

translation.en: We missed you a lot, Ma.
My daughter, granddaughter, and great- granddaughter.
translation.fr: Ma fille, ma petite-fille et mon arrière-petite-fille.

translation.en: ♪ To see my family I hopped on an plane ♪
translation.fr: Pour voir ma famille J'ai pris l'avion

translation.en: ♪ My sweet, loving Ma You're always on my brain ♪
translation.fr: Douce Maman Je pense souvent à toi

translation.en: ♪ And with Par- Nani here The family's together again! ♪
translation.fr: Et avec Par-Nani La famille est réunie

translation.en: ♪ Hiccup it up Hiccup it up ♪
♪ Hic hic hiccup Hiccup it up ♪
♪ Loved ones far away Is not easy ♪
♪ And if you have hiccups You miss them terribly ♪
translation.fr: Le hoquet signifie qu'ils te manquent

translation.en: ♪ So if you hic Don't think you're sick ♪
translation.fr: Alors ne te crois pas malade

translation.en: ♪ Just sing along with me ♪ Hic… up!
♪ Hiccup it up Hiccup it up ♪
♪ Hic hic hiccup Hiccup it up! ♪
See? I missed you, too, Betiyaa!
Ah, thank you, Anoop.
Ati Uttam! A perfect Love Cake!
translation.fr: Ati uttam. Ce love cake est parfait.

translation.en: Play It Safe!
I can't wait to give Pintu and Raki these bracelets for Raksha Bandhan!
translation.fr: Je vais donner ces bracelets à Pintu et Raki pour le Raksha Bandhan.

translation.en: Oh, Raksha Bandhan's a ceremony
translation.fr: C'est un festival où la sœur donne à son frère un bracelet

translation.en: where sisters give their brothers bracelets called rakhis.
translation.fr: C'est un festival où la sœur donne à son frère un bracelet appelé rakhi.

translation.en: It means we promise to protect each other.
Ah- ah- ah, Anoop!
We need to save those ladoos for when it's time for the ceremony!
translation.fr: On doit garder ces ladoos pour la cérémonie.

translation.en: It's time for the ceremony! Just one for now, Anoop.
translation.fr: - C'est l'heure de la cérémonie ! - Juste un pour l'instant.

translation.en: Happy Raksha Bandhan!
Let's see… do we have everything we need to celebrate our siblings?
translation.fr: On a ce qu'il faut pour fêter nos frères et sœurs ?

translation.en: Ladoos, diya, kumkum, rice…
And I made rakhis! Let's get started!
translation.fr: - Et j'ai fait des rakhis. - C'est parti.

translation.en: A rakhi for Raki!
And one for you.
Sisters get one too?
This year, we're switching up the tradition a bit in our family.
translation.fr: Cette année, on change la tradition.

translation.en: You've got my back, I've got yours. Thanks, Raki!
translation.fr: - Tu me protèges, je te protège. - Merci, Raki.

translation.en: And now one for Pintu!
Thanks, Mama!
I'll protect you at all times, little bro!
translation.fr: Je te protégerai toujours, petit frère.

translation.en: And of course one for Anoop, my other brother!
translation.fr: Et bien sûr, un pour Anoop, mon autre frère.

translation.en: Perfect!
♪ When I tie this bracelet on ♪
♪ We know what to do ♪
♪ I will always have your back ♪
♪ We'll always have yours too! ♪
translation.fr: Et on sera là pour toi

translation.en: ♪ Sisters and brothers ♪
♪ Hey! Hey! Protect each other ♪
♪ Sisters and brothers ♪
♪ Every day! ♪
♪ Whenever we need protecting ♪
♪ We're by each other's side! ♪
♪ To show you just how much I care ♪
♪ Is why this bracelet's tied ♪
♪ Oh, sisters and brothers ♪
♪ Hey! Hey! Protect each other ♪
♪ Sisters and brothers ♪
♪ Hey! Hey! Every day! ♪
♪ Sisters and brothers ♪
♪ Hey! Hey! Protect each other ♪
♪ Sisters and brothers ♪
♪ Hey! Hey! Every day! ♪
Hey, who's up for a game of Bouncy Bunny Elephant Hop?
translation.fr: Hé ! Qui est partant pour un saut d'éléphant ?

translation.en: Me!
Okay, we all take turns being a bouncy bunny, and hop over the stuffed elephant.
translation.fr: Le lapin bondissant saute par-dessus la peluche éléphant.

translation.en: Your turn, Anoop.
Ha ha, my turn!
Bouncy bunny elephant! Hop hop!
translation.fr: Je suis un lapin bondissant. Hop !

translation.en: Pintu! Are you okay?
Oh no! Anoop, Pintu has a boo- boo!
translation.fr: Oh non, Anoop, Pintu a un bobo.

translation.en: All better!
And he's off again.
Hmm, Anoop, we've gotta protect Pintu every second of the day!
translation.fr: Anoop, on doit protéger Pintu toute la journée.

translation.en: I won't let him get hurt again!
translation.fr: Je ne veux plus qu'il se blesse.

translation.en: Which is why we'll be…
Yeah!
The Safety Squad!
The world can be a dangerous place,
but the Safety Squad will do whatever it takes to keep Pintu…
translation.fr: mais la brigade fera tout pour que Pintu…

translation.en: …safe and sound!
Again! Again! Again!
Look, Anoop! There's danger everywhere.
translation.fr: Regarde, Anoop. Le danger est partout.

translation.en: Those blocks have sharp corners!
translation.fr: Ces cubes ont des coins pointus

translation.en: And Pintu could trip on the edge of this rug!
translation.fr: et Pintu pourrait trébucher sur le tapis.

translation.en: Nice one!
Without the rug,
Pintu could slip on these shiny floors.
translation.fr: Pintu pourrait glisser sur ce sol brillant.

translation.en: Hmm…  I know just what to do!
Baba's two- sided sticky tape should do it!
translation.fr: Le ruban adhésif de Baba devrait suffire.

translation.en: It sticks to the floor and your feet!
translation.fr: Il colle au sol et aux pieds.

translation.en: Pintu slipping and falling?
Ha! Not on Safety Squad's watch!
translation.fr: Pas sous la garde de la brigade.

translation.en: Look-- whoa!
Pintu could accidentally crash his tricycle into this plant!
Or ride over a guest key, get a flat tire, and skid out of control!
translation.fr: Ou rouler sur une clé, avoir un pneu crevé et déraper.

translation.en: You see a fan.
I see a wind so strong, it could blow my little brother away!
translation.fr: moi, une rafale qui pourrait emporter mon petit frère.

translation.en: Don't worry, Anoop. Safety Squad's… on the job!
translation.fr: Ne t'inquiète pas, Anoop. La brigade de protection est sur le coup.

translation.en: If we can just make Pintu stay in one safe area,
translation.fr: Si on peut mettre Pintu en lieu sûr,

translation.en: we'll be able to protect him.
We'll create the safety zone!
translation.fr: On va créer La Zone de Sécurité.

translation.en: Good work, partner!
Protecting Pintu just got a little easier!
translation.fr: Protéger Pintu est devenu plus facile.

translation.en: Oh no! Where'd he go?
Pintu? Huh?
translation.fr: Oh non ! Où est-il ? Pintu ? Hein ? Il a dû s'échapper.

translation.en: He must have escaped.
Safety Squad alert!
He's headed upstairs!
- Pintu! -
Oh, man! I'm in trouble!
Hear that? Raki's in trouble!
Huh?
Hey, Deepa.
Looks like Raki's okay.
I think he'll be safe here for a long time.
We gotta focus on the brother who needs the most protection… - Pintu! -
translation.fr: Occupons-nous du frère qui a besoin de nous : Pintu.

translation.en: He's headed downstairs!
Pintu sure is lucky he has us to protect him!
translation.fr: Pintu est chanceux de nous avoir.

translation.en: With the sitting room and the dining room blocked off, he'll stay safe and sound right here!
translation.fr: Le salon et la salle à manger étant bloqués, il sera en sécurité ici.

translation.en: That boy needs to have some fun… away from my napping area.
translation.fr: Ce garçon a besoin de jouer, loin de mon coin sieste.

translation.en: I have a plan to distract Deepa and Anoop so this toddler can pedal free…
translation.fr: Je vais distraire Deepa et Anoop pour qu'il puisse pédaler librement,

translation.en: but I'm going to need a disguise…
translation.fr: mais il me faut un déguisement.

translation.en: and a banana.
Did somebody say banana?
Anoop, Pintu got out again?!
Pintu, slow down! It's dangerous!
When did you learn to run this fast? A triple flip?
translation.fr: Depuis quand tu cours aussi vite ? Un triple salto ? Génial !

translation.en: Awesome! But not safe!
translation.fr: Depuis quand tu cours aussi vite ? Un triple salto ? Génial ! Mais imprudent. On doit l'arrêter.

translation.en: We gotta stop him, Anoop!
- Oo oo ah ah! - Maruti?
Anoop, we've been tricked!
Pintu might be out there somewhere without us to protect him!
translation.fr: Pintu erre quelque part sans notre protection.

translation.en: Ride free, young man!
Yay!
Pintu gonna play outside!
There he is! We've gotta protect him!
translation.fr: Le voilà. Il faut le protéger.

translation.en: Okay… new idea.
This time, we mean business!
translation.fr: Cette fois, on ne plaisante pas.

translation.en: That's one good thing about living in a bed and breakfast, Anoop. Plenty of pillows!
translation.fr: L'avantage d'une maison d'hôtes : il y a plein d'oreillers.

translation.en: Yeah!
Snack time! Deepa? Anoop? I've got nice warm chapatis for you!
translation.fr: C'est l'heure du goûter. Deepa ? Anoop ? J'ai fait des chapatis.

translation.en: Pintu?
Oh, no, ya don't, Pintu.
The kitchen is not in the safety zone!
translation.fr: La cuisine n'est pas en zone sûre.

translation.en: - Deepa, we must talk. - Whoa!
Sure, Naani- ji! Anoop, keep an eye on you- know- who.
translation.fr: Bien sûr, Naani-ji. Anoop, surveille tu-sais-qui.

translation.en: I appreciate your intentions, but maybe they're a bit too much.
translation.fr: J'apprécie tes intentions, mais c'est peut-être un peu trop.

translation.en: What do you mean?
We're totally on top of helping him stay safe!
translation.fr: On l'aide à rester en sécurité.

translation.en: But you're also stopping him from doing anything he enjoys.
translation.fr: Mais tu l'empêches aussi de faire ce qu'il aime.

translation.en: Beta, do you remember when you used to jump off the front step?
translation.fr: Tu te souviens quand tu sautais du perron ?

translation.en: I was a flying fairy!
Oh, but then I fell down.
You always held my hand after that so I wouldn't fall.
translation.fr: Après ça, tu me tenais toujours la main.

translation.en: Exactly, but you still jumped off that step.
translation.fr: Exactement, mais tu sautais quand même.

translation.en: So if Pintu falls while having fun?
translation.fr: Donc si Pintu tombe en s'amusant,

translation.en: I'll be there to help him.
Pintu!
Who wants to play Bouncy Bunny Elephant Hop?  Yeah! Bouncy Bunny-- whoa…
translation.fr: - Qui veut jouer au saut d'éléphant ? - Oui ! Le lapin bondi…

translation.en: Bouncy Bunny Elephant Hop!
You can do it, Pintu!
Bouncy Bunny Elephant!
Hop! I did it!
Brothers and sisters forever!
